elementSpec.desc: in a bibliographic reference, contains the name of the author(s), personal or corporate, of a work; the primary statement of responsibility for any bibliographic item.

egXML.author: British Broadcasting Corporation
La Fayette, Marie Madeleine Pioche de la Vergne, comtesse de (1634–1693)

remarks.p: Particularly where cataloguing is likely to be based on the content of the header, it is advisable to use generally recognized authority lists for the exact form of personal names.
In the case of a broadcast, use this element for the name of the company or network which broadcasts the program.
